properties.title: Seilpark Engadin
properties.abstract: At the beginning of June 2009 a high wire and climbing adventure park was opened in Sur En. In the surrounding forest, mere metres from the Sur En campsite, you'll find a variety of courses at different levels of difficulty.
properties.description:
Participants of all ages can thus find just the right challenge for them. At only one metre above the ground, the Tramblai course (Southside) is ideal for the smallest visitors. The Uina course with its 15 different elements runs above it at two metres in height.

At five metres above the ground, the Quar course consists of twelve elements, while the Rims course floats considerably above the Sursass course (7m) at ten metres above the earth. The Lischana course, which consists of several flying foxes, guarantees thrills at twelve metres high.
